DOC.criteria: Have read , understood , signed consent form ( assent form , < 18 year old ) Are ages 1045 year Weigh least 75 pound ( 34 kg ) Meet groupspecific criterion Smoke Have history cardiovascular disease Have hepatic impairment , demonstrate abnormal baseline liver function lab test result Have donate blood within 3 month prior study anemic show baseline lab result Are unwilling discontinue dietary supplement ( exclude medical food ) two week prior first study visit Are currently take medication interfere interpretation select endpoint ( lipidlowering medication ) Are currently pregnant breastfeed Excluding PKU , chronic illness , disorder , condition ( include limit diabetes , hypertension , cancer ) Have take investigational drug ( include Kuvan Kuvanunresponsive participant & control ) within 3 month prior study In opinion Investigator , include study reason , include inability follow study procedure
